content.rendered:
(*11*)

The ‘Rabbit Ear’ design means that you can merely pull/push the cable to get the precise match. The EarBuds even have a pleasant a contemporary appear and feel with a pill-shaped primary physique, to take issues a bit additional, design-wise. To full the image, the cables use a double braided, nylon masking to make sure type and sturdiness are each taken under consideration.

(*12*)

The Perfect Pairing

iPhone/iPad/iPod + NeoFlow Color + the Lightning Connector, for really clear, unadulterated sound, the way in which the soundtrack to your life has all the time meant to be.

(*12*)

Why People Choose PALOVUE

Comfortable ear items in 4 thrilling colorways, guarantee there is a proper ‘match’ for you. Quality materials used all through to make sure you really feel assured in a effectively crafted product.

With the Lightning connector, your audio will get out of your machine to your ears in as pure and unadulterated approach as doable. Music the way in which is was meant to be heard.

Designed to remain put so you’ll be able to pay attention with out distraction. With our securely becoming Earwings and Earbuds, you might be assured of uninterrupted use – exercise or rest.
